languages.text: "Взятки? Какой ашмаг очернил свои червивые уста столь гнусной ложью? Впрочем, не говори, я не желаю даже слышать сего опозоренного имени. Я не требовала взяток ни с одного твоего подданного. Но с охотой принимала подарки, которые они подносили. Разве это преступление?"

"Bribes? What ashmag besmirched their worm-eaten lips with such a scurrilous lie? Actually, don't tell me — I don't even want to hear their blackened name. I have never demanded bribes from any of your vassals. But I have willingly accepted the gifts they have offered. Is that a crime?"
languages.original_text: "Взятки? Какой ашмаг очернил свои червивые уста столь гнусной ложью? Впрочем, не говори, я не желаю даже слышать сего опозоренного имени. Я не требовала взяток ни с одного твоего подданного. Но с охотой принимала подарки, которые они подносили. Разве это преступление?"

traits.locale_text: "Bribes? What ashmag besmirched their worm-eaten lips with such a scurrilous lie? Actually, don't tell me — I don't even want to hear their blackened name. I have never demanded bribes from any of your vassals. But I have willingly accepted the gifts they have offered. Is that a crime?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

I have never demanded bribes from any of your vassals. But I have willingly accepted the gifts they have offered. Is that a crime?"

I have never demanded bribes from any of your vassals. But I have willingly accepted the gifts they have offered. Is that a crime?"

traits.locale_text: "Bribes? What ashmag besmirched their worm-eaten lips with such a scurrilous lie? Actually, don't tell me — I don't even want to hear their blackened name. I have never demanded bribes from any of your vassals. But I have willingly accepted the gifts they have offered. Is that a crime?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “贿赂？究竟是哪个坏种说的？他们被虫子蛀过的嘴里，竟然会说出这种无耻的谎言！老实说，还是别告诉我了，我甚至不愿意听他们卑鄙的名字。我从来没向你的任何臣民索贿，不过我确实心甘情愿地接受过他们送给我的馈赠，这算是违法犯罪吗？”
languages.original_text: "Bribes? What ashmag besmirched their worm-eaten lips with such a scurrilous lie? Actually, don't tell me — I don't even want to hear their blackened name. I have never demanded bribes from any of your vassals. But I have willingly accepted the gifts they have offered. Is that a crime?"

traits.locale_text: “贿赂？究竟是哪个坏家伙说的？他们被虫子蛀过的嘴里，竟然会说出这种无耻的谎言！老实说，还是别告诉我了，我甚至不愿意听他们卑鄙的名字。我从来没向你的任何臣民索贿，不过我确实心甘情愿地接受过他们送给我的馈赠，这算是违法犯罪吗？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「賄賂？どこのどいつが、そんな卑劣な嘘をついたっていうの？ああ、言わないで…そんな汚らしい名前なんて、聞きたくもないよ。あたしはあんたの臣下に賄賂を要求したことなんてないよ。でも、彼らが差し出した贈り物は喜んで受け取ってきた。それが罪だっていうの？」
languages.original_text: "Bribes? What ashmag besmirched their worm-eaten lips with such a scurrilous lie? Actually, don't tell me — I don't even want to hear their blackened name. I have never demanded bribes from any of your vassals. But I have willingly accepted the gifts they have offered. Is that a crime?"

traits.locale_text: 「賄賂？どこのどいつが、そんな卑劣な嘘をついたっていうの？ああ、言わないで…そんな汚らしい名前なんて、聞きたくもないよ。あたしはあんたの臣下に賄賂を要求したことなんてないよ。でも、彼らが差し出した贈り物は喜んで受け取ってきた。それが罪だっていうの？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Sobornos? ¿Pero qué ashmag retorcido suelta esa clase de patrañas? No me lo diga, no quiero ni oír su indigno nombre. Nunca he exigido sobornos a sus vasallos. Sí he aceptado los regalos que me han hecho voluntariamente algunos de ellos, pero ¿eso es delito?».
languages.original_text: "Bribes? What ashmag besmirched their worm-eaten lips with such a scurrilous lie? Actually, don't tell me — I don't even want to hear their blackened name. I have never demanded bribes from any of your vassals. But I have willingly accepted the gifts they have offered. Is that a crime?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Sobornos? ¿Pero qué ashmag retorcido suelta esa clase de patrañas? No me lo diga, no quiero ni oír su indigno nombre. Nunca he exigido sobornos a sus vasallos. Sí he aceptado los regalos que me han hecho voluntariamente algunos de ellos, pero ¿eso es delito?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Des pots-de-vin ? Quel genre d'ashmag a bien pu souiller ses lèvres véreuses avec un mensonge aussi ignoble ? Non, ne répondez pas... Je ne veux même pas entendre le nom de ce traître. Je n'ai jamais exigé le moindre pot-de-vin de qui que ce soit parmi vos sujets, mais j'ai volontiers accepté les cadeaux qui m'étaient proposés. S'agit-il d'un crime ? »
languages.original_text: "Bribes? What ashmag besmirched their worm-eaten lips with such a scurrilous lie? Actually, don't tell me — I don't even want to hear their blackened name. I have never demanded bribes from any of your vassals. But I have willingly accepted the gifts they have offered. Is that a crime?"

traits.locale_text: « Des pots-de-vin ? Quel genre d'ashmag a bien pu souiller ses lèvres véreuses avec un mensonge aussi ignoble ? Non, ne répondez pas... Je ne veux même pas entendre le nom de ce traître. Je n'ai jamais exigé le moindre pot-de-vin de qui que ce soit parmi vos sujets, mais j'ai volontiers accepté les cadeaux qui m'étaient proposés. S'agit-il d'un crime ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Schmiergelder? Welcher Ashmag besudelt denn seine verrotteten Lippen mit solch schändlichen Lügen? Eigentlich braucht Ihr nichts zu sagen – ich will seinen verleumderischen Namen gar nicht erst wissen. Ich habe noch nie Schmiergeld von einem Eurer Lehnsleute verlangt. Aber sie haben mir Geschenke gemacht und die habe ich gerne angenommen. Gilt das schon als Verbrechen?"
languages.original_text: "Bribes? What ashmag besmirched their worm-eaten lips with such a scurrilous lie? Actually, don't tell me — I don't even want to hear their blackened name. I have never demanded bribes from any of your vassals. But I have willingly accepted the gifts they have offered. Is that a crime?"

traits.locale_text: "Schmiergelder? Welcher Ashmag besudelt denn seine verrotteten Lippen mit solch schändlichen Lügen? Eigentlich braucht Ihr nichts zu sagen – ich will seinen verleumderischen Namen gar nicht erst wissen. Ich habe noch nie Schmiergeld von einem Eurer Lehnsleute verlangt. Aber sie haben mir Geschenke gemacht und die habe ich gerne angenommen. Gilt das schon als Verbrechen?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Rüşvet mi? Solucanlar yiyesice dudaklarını böylesi çirkin yalanlarla kirleten külboğaz da kim? Hiç söyleme aslında, o şahsın kara ismini duymak bile istemiyorum. Tebaandan hiçbir zaman rüşvet talep etmedim. Bana kendi rızalarıyla teklif ettikleri armağanları da geri çevirmedim. Bu suç mu?"
languages.original_text: "Bribes? What ashmag besmirched their worm-eaten lips with such a scurrilous lie? Actually, don't tell me — I don't even want to hear their blackened name. I have never demanded bribes from any of your vassals. But I have willingly accepted the gifts they have offered. Is that a crime?"

traits.locale_text: "Rüşvet mi? Solucanlar yiyesi dudaklarını böylesi çirkin yalanlarla kirleten külboğaz da kim? Hiç söyleme aslında, o şahsın kara ismini duymak bile istemiyorum. Tebaalarından hiçbir zaman rüşvet talep etmedim. Ama bana kendi rızalarıyla teklif ettikleri armağanları da geri çevirmedim. Bu bir suç mu?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
